response.overview: Four great minds. Four modern AIs. One surreal conversation. Artificial Alfred Hitchcock presents four of today’s most advanced language models, each inhabiting the voice of a historical genius:  • ChatGPT becomes Friedrich Nietzsche, philosopher of rupture and fire;  • Claude channels Johann Sebastian Bach, divine architect of musical order;  • Gemini transforms into Ada Lovelace, prophet of computing;  • DeepSeek speaks as William Blake, mystic of the imagination.
response.title: Manifesto for Future AIs

release_dates.note: Message to Man International Film Festival
